review.title: “Awesome place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Extremely flexible hours, vacation. Multiple perks like free food, computers, devices. Also have the option to attend trainings/conferences annually.
review.cons: Cons – There are growing pains as the company goes from a startup to a larger company.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
